programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice
programme.desc: Comedy legend Denise Scott joins Alice in the kitchen. Before she arrives, Alice whips up an '80s classic - the scotch egg. Denise pops in with a basket full of vegetables asking Alice to help her fall back in love with them.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent
programme.desc: In Spain protests against mass tourism have erupted across the nation. Angry locals demand action to stop hordes of tourists from occupying their cities. Tourism is being blamed for a housing crisis that's forcing locals out.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: First Weapons
programme.desc: Australia's most lethal boomerang, the Wartilykirri. Host Phil Breslin and weapon maker Joseph Williams unpack this non-returning boomerang and witness its manoeuvrability and force in a medieval battle. (Final)

programme.title: Culture By Design

programme.desc: When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Baby’s doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this “Qilin” isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Oh creates a boov-tech machine that makes Tip and Lucy the same age/When Tip is fired from Garbage, she gets a new job at Garfeldt's fish stand

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip finds out what Oh does all day while she's at school/Oh tries to change his good reputation by acting out

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Skidmark gets jealous when White Shadow and Turbo become best friends; the crew must race as a bobsled team against the favored Jamaican Chickens.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: The crew teams up with grasshoppers in a fight against devious picnic ants; Turbo goes to great lengths to make somebody on the internet like him.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The Dinotrux return to the crater from their travels to find that D-Structs has taken over and built a huge wall to keep them out.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: When an audience heckler calls out the show for having a stale formula, Peabody mixes things up and has disastrous results.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: You Oughta Be in Pictures When Mantha sees a Deedstown mob attacking a group of fellow zombies, she's determined to lead them in a counterattack. Crypt Critters Mantha comes down with an embarrassing case of crypt critters, but refuses to go to the nurse.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The fairies are giving a big fairy flying display in Toyland. Fairy Coco is devastated when her wings disappear just before the Flying Display. Queen Sparklewings tells Noddy that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and if anybody else tries to use them it would be dangerous as they may fall and hurt themselves. Noddy immediately stars to investigate. Following all the clues, he works out that Smartysaurus found the wings after Fairy Coco took them off in the Fairy Garden. And now she's planning on flying with them! Noddy, Bumpy and Revs rush to the DinoHills to save Smartysaurus before she has a nasty accident. The big dinosaur is very excited about flying. Noddy explains that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and Smartysaurus sadly gives them back. Clever Noddy has an idea though and later that evening, at the flying display, Smartysaurus, Toyland's first flying dinosaur makes her debut – with a little help from the building crane and a big dino-harness! Noddy's saved the day again. Case closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo and Slugsy put on a magic show. But will anybody find out that he is a fraud?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy takes a game of Kings and Queens too seriously and starts to boss the other animals around. The animals don't want to play with her anymore, can Topsy help them change their mind?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a “family fairy” means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sam’s favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but she’s not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets’ longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now it’s up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: The girls get summer jobs to help Lucky repair the sprawling house she inherited from her grandfather near the Rosemead Valley Racetrack.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: Determined to save her family home, Lucky signs up to race as a wild card in Rosemead's elite Junior Cup. But winning it all won't be easy.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Pajuna attempts to tell fortunes and gets possessed with an evil spirit, out to get revenge on Puss

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Pajuna’s former partner, Roz, returns to San Lorenzo asking for help with ongoing jobs, Pajuna leaves the Cantina causing Puss to have a potential breakdown

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch attend a Howl-O-Ween costume party at the Big Bowl Diner, excited to get a taste of Wagnes’ famous Pupclairs. But when the lights go out and the treats go missing, it's up to Tag to solve the case. / Tag and Scooch are determined to throw a Howl-O-Ween party for their cat friends in Meowbuquerque, but they must get the dogs of Pawston to change their ways so they can make the celebration more cat-friendly.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song “just for them”, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.desc: The Dinotrux return to the crater from their travels to find that D-Structs has taken over and built a huge wall to keep them out.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: When an audience heckler calls out the show for having a stale formula, Peabody mixes things up and has disastrous results.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: You Oughta Be in Pictures When Mantha sees a Deedstown mob attacking a group of fellow zombies, she's determined to lead them in a counterattack. Crypt Critters Mantha comes down with an embarrassing case of crypt critters, but refuses to go to the nurse.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The fairies are giving a big fairy flying display in Toyland. Fairy Coco is devastated when her wings disappear just before the Flying Display. Queen Sparklewings tells Noddy that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and if anybody else tries to use them it would be dangerous as they may fall and hurt themselves. Noddy immediately stars to investigate. Following all the clues, he works out that Smartysaurus found the wings after Fairy Coco took them off in the Fairy Garden. And now she's planning on flying with them! Noddy, Bumpy and Revs rush to the DinoHills to save Smartysaurus before she has a nasty accident. The big dinosaur is very excited about flying. Noddy explains that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and Smartysaurus sadly gives them back. Clever Noddy has an idea though and later that evening, at the flying display, Smartysaurus, Toyland's first flying dinosaur makes her debut – with a little help from the building crane and a big dino-harness! Noddy's saved the day again. Case closed!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo and Slugsy put on a magic show. But will anybody find out that he is a fraud?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy takes a game of Kings and Queens too seriously and starts to boss the other animals around. The animals don't want to play with her anymore, can Topsy help them change their mind?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman" , the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: Our Golden Days
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: Music Bank
programme.desc: The best tunes in Korea! the most sensational music show on TV satisfies all your senses! Fantastic performances and Awe-inspiring harmony by the nation's top musicians! Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Healer
programme.desc: A mysterious messenger of the 22nd century, an online newspaper reporter who works hard not to be a "yellow journalist," and a popular reporter who agonizes over the truth and reality. When these three people meet, a passionate romance starts and the truths from the past and present reveal themselves to the world. This drama features young people and how they grow as real journalists.

programme.title: Good Luck!
programme.desc: A life story of three friends, one who is rich, one who is poor, and one who wishes to be rich, along with their families.

programme.title: Queen's House

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: Maminata Ouandaogo's passion for African hairstyles has helped hundreds in Japan with their natural hair. But outside her salon, she says social pressure keeps some people from embracing it.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Ishikawa Mao is an award-winning photographer who has been documenting the lives of people in Okinawa for 50 years. She talks about what she wants to express through her work.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: This time, we accompany Finnish-native Laura Kopilow on her journey to discover tasty parfaits all over Japan, and meet Chinese Wang Ying who works at a selfie studio in Shinjuku, Tokyo.

programme.title: Easy Travel Japanese
programme.desc: #4 Now use them/ When traveling in Japan for the first time, what phrases do you need? 4 episodes (3 minutes each) provide simple expressions you can put to use as soon as you land.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: the Sannai Maruyama Site.

programme.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your

programme.desc: Hefty casts a spell which accidentally turns him into a colossal nose that sucks up everything in its path! // After catching Clumsy, Gargamel tempts him with a magic amulet that makes his clumsiness disappear.

programme.desc: Alvin invites Dave's old high school rival to an elaborate dinner to prove to him that Dave is a huge success.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: After Schwoz creates a disease that accidentally effects Charlotte, Henry, his family, and even Ray, he quarantines them in Henry’s house in order to find a cure.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Danger Force must fulfill a new Prophecy that they etched into the cave wall; four heroes defeating a powerful monster. To achieve this, they inject themselves with Mom Energy to boost their powers, as Big Dark Dynomite wreaks havoc in Swellview.

programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne discovers that each family member will perform for Hector's birthday, she turns to Sid for help. // Ronnie Anne's attempts to bond with her cool older cousin Carlota lead to a prank war against the boy cousins.

programme.desc: The sisters think Lincoln is bad luck so they ban him from attending their activities. // When Lincoln finds out his class is dissecting frogs, he and Lana embark on a mission to rescue them.

programme.desc: When Dev refuses to participate in Kindness Day, Hazel summons an intergalactic species of diplomats to reason with him.

programme.desc: Lana wants to win a race car ride-along with her hero, so she and Lincoln enter to compete in a soap box derby. // When Luan must enroll in a culinary class, Dad uses it to share his passion for cooking with one of his kids.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln tries to swap middle school classes after being separated from the gang, but ends up being transferred to Canada. Lori doesn't fit in on any of the college dorm floors. Mom and Dad rush to potty train Lily for preschool.

programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur, Cosmo and Wanda bring a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period to present day. // Hazel wishes Jasmine was fearless, but the wish goes awry when Jasmine's fears escape and invade the school!

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Danger Force and Captain Man go undercover as bad guys at The Beatin' Dungeon to catch a criminal. If their cover is blown, they'll have to fight all of Swellview's toughest villains at once.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: ShoutOut has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to sell a movie to Hollywood bigshot Deuce Van Nuys, but when her mind goes blank under the pressure, the rest of Danger Force pitch in and share their own epic--and epically bad--movie ideas.

programme.desc: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks he's solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe can't control.

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt For The Blood Orchid
programme.desc: A team of scientists braves the dangers of the rain forest in search of a flower that contains a youth serum.

programme.title: The Man With The Iron Fists 2
programme.desc: Thaddeus is attacked on his way to the Wu Chi Temple but is saved by a couple who treat his wounds and offer him refuge. Soon, he becomes involved in their local conflict.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm

programme.title: Collateral

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Redemption

programme.title: Ali

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Les etoiles De L'Ombre : Michel Mallory
programme.desc: A little-known songwriter, Michel Mallory is behind many of France's greatest popular hits. He recounts the story of his life and career, through that of his childhood in Corsica, his unique way of composing, his partnerships with Johnny Hallyday, Sylvie Vartan, Michel Sardou, Claude FranCois, Jeane Manson...

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade
programme.desc: Clemence Castel meets Christophe in the Orne bocage. Although he has had other jobs, Christophe is now a clown and decided, at 50, to serve others by creating his association Hop hop hop, clown in the hospital.

programme.title: Bleu Ocean
programme.desc: In Polynesia, the cyclone season requires vigilance and preparation. Each year, events like cyclones, storms, or tsunamis threaten the islands. Residents organize to face these risks, while scientists monitor and forecast their occurrence to reduce dangers.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco
programme.desc: Near Reims, Celine renovated a superb country house set in the midst of a large park.

programme.title: Nus & Culottes
programme.desc: Nans and Mouts are embarking on a new adventure. They set off from a huge cave in the Lot region of France on a very special quest: to meet a stranger and help him realise his dream. It's a journey that will surprise them more than once, and throw up some curious signs along the way.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Chef Ayaba Galbas prepares coconut vegetables infused with kaloupile leaves.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs !
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: Bande De Sportifs !
programme.desc: The intrepid journalist, Theo, goes out to meet young athletes to get an introduction to their disciplines. Each sport has its own unique rules, equipment and history.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way of travelling back through ancient eras and civilisations. They embark on a journey back in time, passing through popular civilisations such as ancient Egypt and Greece, as well as sub-Saharan Africa, the Middle East and Mesopotamia.

programme.desc: Turquoise waters, colorful reefs, dolphins and whales... How much longer can we enjoy the splendors of the Mediterranean coast? How far will the beaches shrink? Which fish can we eat without encouraging overfishing? Overtourism, pollution, global warming - the Mediterranean has never been so threatened. But there are solutions...

programme.title: De Grandes Esperances
programme.desc: Madeleine and Antoine are an ambitious, politically committed couple. They are waiting for their ENA admission results. But on an isolated road in Corsica, a tragedy occurs that binds them together forever. Their relationship and their professional futures are turned upside down, hampered by this heavy secret.

programme.title: Cerebrum
programme.desc: It was an ordinary day like any other at the Institut National de Sante Mentale. But that evening, Anne didn't join Henri at the restaurant. Worried, he contacted the authorities. His worst nightmare becomes reality when her file is entrusted to Inspector Simone Vallier: his wife has indeed disappeared.

programme.title: Cerebrum
programme.desc: Anne's disappearance remains a total mystery. Henri and the children spend an anxious night. Henri visits Anne's office with Simone, where a major surprise awaits. The search is intensified; it is now obvious that she is in danger.

programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.desc: A young man develops schizophrenia after his mother's suicide. After he meets a kindred spirit at the psychiatric hospital, he forges a plan with the man to escape.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Kumukulong Dugo
programme.desc: Kumukulong Dugo

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin 2) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Humanap Ka Ng Panget (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Andrew E made his acting debut in this wacky comedy based on his big hit "Humanap Ka ng Panget". The message of the song is that if you want to be happy it is best to fall in love with an ugly woman or man who will be grateful for your love and will do anything you want.

programme.title: Mandurugas
programme.desc: Comedians Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs took on the spotlight in this film, which was their first screen team-up. The wacky duo played small-time con-men who, for a quick buck, would do anything or become anything.

programme.title: Okey Si Ma'am
programme.desc: Keempee, Donna, Paco and Lander played high school senior students each having their own personal dilemmas. Ms. Sonia (Alice Dixson), with her unorthodox way of teaching became their counselor and friend who brought out the best in her students.

programme.title: Tondo, Libingan Ng Mga Siga
programme.desc: Tondo, where gangs proliferate and crime is a way of life. This is the home of Willie Cuevas, who made his living doing the dirty work for a corrupt law enforcer.

programme.title: Bakit Kay Tagal Ng Sandali?
programme.desc: Nina (Dina Bonnevie) and Ted (Julio Diaz) are sweethearts. Ted convinces her to accept Don Edmundo's (Eddie Garcia) suit as the old man is said to be dying anyway.

programme.title: Lalakwe
programme.desc: Anna falls in love with and gives her womanhood to womanizer Eric who promises her marriage. Upon her brother’s insistence to meet the man, she realizes then that Eric is married.

programme.title: Adan Lazaro (Search and Destroy)
programme.desc: Roi Vinzon portrays Adan Lazaro, a highly specialized intelligence agent who returns to his motherland to stop a group of terrorists who are out to wreck havoc to the country's ailing economy.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: When Andy marries Grace, he is surprised to discover that her family are staying with them. Andy becomes the "house-band" and serves his wife and her family.

programme.title: Magic Kombat
programme.desc: Enter the world of mischief adventures and hilarious experiences in the video game land.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes 2
programme.desc: It's Déjà vu all over again in part 2 of our mind bending special where Michael shares brand new takes on his favorite tricks with never-before-seen footage!

programme.desc: Michael takes viewers behind the scenes and shows them never seen tricks.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 8
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin go head-to-head testing out hacks to make your pool party the event of the year.

programme.desc: The guys play a game of copycat at the park while babysitting kids. Then, they hit the supermarket for an epic battle of catch and release, and the loser learns that creeping around the gym is more uncomfortable than working out.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 05
programme.desc: Michael reveals the transformative properties of fruits and vegetables, and shows a caterer the true power of dairy products. Plus, an antique store customer is stunned when a species of termite literally chews through the scenery!

Finally, at the Navy Yard, Michael pushes his skills to the limit when he attempts one of his most ambitious feats yet - tricking two people at the same time!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 4

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 2
programme.desc: The wagon train must ford a dangerous river, leading to a moral struggle between Ezekiel and Benny over the soul of the group. Meanwhile, Prudence and Todd meet hipster pioneers living #wagonlife.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 4
programme.desc: Feel the adrenaline rush with 20 of the dumbest daredevils ever caught on film. We've got base jumpers, bull riders, tightrope walkers, even an alligator wrangler. And they all have one thing in common - hilarious fails. With hair-raising commentaryfrom our celebrity cast, including Leif Garrett, Todd Bridges and Chelsea Peretti.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 9
programme.desc: Can friends with benefits still be friends without? Leonard and Penny try hanging out alone, while Sheldon must overcome his fear of birds.

programme.title: Friends S6 5
programme.desc: Joey pretends to be the owner of a Porsche whose owner left his keys at Central Perk. Rachel and Ross get divorced. Chandler and Monica babysit Phoebe's triplets.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 8
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin go head-to-head testing out hacks to make your pool party the event of the year.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 4
programme.desc: The guys play a game of copycat at the park while babysitting kids. Then, they hit the supermarket for an epic battle of catch and release, and the loser learns that creeping around the gym is more uncomfortable than working out.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes 2
programme.desc: It's Déjà vu all over again in part 2 of our mind bending special where Michael shares brand new takes on his favorite tricks with never-before-seen footage!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes 3
programme.desc: Michael takes viewers behind the scenes and shows them never seen tricks.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 05
programme.desc: Michael reveals the transformative properties of fruits and vegetables, and shows a caterer the true power of dairy products. Plus, an antique store customer is stunned when a species of termite literally chews through the scenery!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 06
programme.desc: At an antique store, Michael shows off an impossible way to organize your clothes, and back at the supermarket we find out that there are some serious surprises lurking in our favorite foods. Finally, at the Navy Yard, Michael pushes his skills to the limit when he attempts one of his most ambitious feats yet - tricking two people at the same time!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Ryomen Sukuna

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Itadori wakes up in an unfamiliar room and before him rests Gojo Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, who declares Itadori's secret execution has been decided upon. Gojo presents Itadori with two options. He can be executed immediately, or he can hunt down all 20 of Ryomen Sukuna's fingers and die after absorbing all of them...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Itadori, Fushiguro, and Gojo head out to meet up with the third first year, Kugizaki Nobara. Thereafter they head to an abandoned building where Gojo tasks Itadori and Kugizaki with exorcising the curses lurking inside. Once inside the building Itadori and Kugizaki split up to look for the curses and Kugizaki faces off against a cunning curse that takes a child hostage.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: An emergency breaks out at a juvenile detention center and Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to handle it. Their mission is to verify and rescue any survivors left inside with the curse womb that could develop into a special grade cursed spirit. Itadori and the others storm in to find a merciless reality waiting for them. Immediately thereafter, Kugisaki disappears and the special grade cursed spirit appears beside Itadori and Fushiguro.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: After retreating outside the juvenile detention center, Fushiguro notices the death of the special grade cursed spirit. The very next moment Ryomen Sukuna appears beside him, and rips Itadori's heart from his body to take him hostage. Fushiguro begins fighting Sukuna to prevent Itadori from dying when he regains control, but he becomes painfully aware of the difference in their strength

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Gojo stews in his frustration over Itadori's death. Both Fushiguro and Nobara are depressed by their teammate's death, but they begin their special training with the second year students to get stronger. Meanwhile, Geto and the others begin to make their move. And during all of that, the dead Itadori...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While in transit Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special grade cursed spirit Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit--Jogo comes face to face with Gojo's strength. In an instant Gojo returns to Jujutsu High and easily picks up mid-training Itadori which causes Jogo's anger to erupt. He takes his next move, to which Gojo—

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: While they're training for the exchange event, Kugisaki and Fushiguro come face to face with Kyoto's Jujutsu High second years - Zen'in Mai and Todo - who challenge them to a fight. Todo overwhelms Fushiguro with physical strength. Meanwhile, Kugisaki is disgusted by Mai's comments and says something to provoke her

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Yoshino Junpei skips school to go to a movie theater, but then he witnesses the classmates who bullied him getting their faces transfigured and dying. He chases after the culprit and calls out to them. Later, Itadori and the ex-salaryman first-grade jujutsu sorcerer, Nanami Kento, storm into the scene of the crime within the theater and encounter two cursed spirits.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Itadori is placed in charge of investigating Yoshino, so he turns to his assistant supervisor, Ijichi for a plan. Their plan to have a low-level curse attack Yoshino and gauge his response fails, so Itadori speaks to him directly. After watching Itadori ultimately drive away the teacher he hated, Yoshino decides to hear him out. Meanwhile, Nanami has pinned down Mahito's base and he delves into the underground sewers to face Mahito.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Mahito corners Nanami, but he releases the limiter on his cursed energy, destroying the wall of the underground channel with Ratio Technique: Collapse, and causing rubble to rain down upon them. Meanwhile, Itadori makes contact with Yoshino and they hit it off after talking about movies. He meets Yoshino's mother, and after being invited into their home, more is revealed...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Mahito deftly uses Yoshino's admiration toward him to make him fight Itadori. Yoshino races toward vengeance and Itadori exchanges blows with him to try and make him explain his motive, which leads to him learning the cruel truth from Yoshino's lips.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: Nanami steps in at the last second to save Itadori from Mahito's blow. Then Itadori and Nanami match their attacks together to ensure they can exorcise Mahito. Mahito pulls out his transfigured humans in an attempt to mentally drive Itadori into a corner, but Itadori manages to overcome them. As Mahito grows trapped under their rain of blows he senses his pending death

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 14
programme.desc: After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mojito reunites with Geto and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu High is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 15
programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 16
programme.desc: Todo points out that Itadori's Divergent Fist is a technique that won't work against special grades. When Itadori genuinely accepts his advice, Todo decides to face him and guide him with his full might. Meanwhile, Kugisaki picks a fight with Kyoto's Nishimiya. From the sidelines Mechamaru fires an attack at Panda, sparking the start of their battles with Kugisaki against Nishimiya and Panda against Mechamaru.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 17
programme.desc: The Exchange Event's Group Battle continues! Maki and Miwa face off, but Miwa can't hide her surprise at the overwhelming strength Maki displays despite her grade ranking. At the same time, Kugisaki pursues Nishimiya as she flies around on her broom. Nishimiya talks about Mai's hardships and what it's like to live as a female jujutsu sorcerer, but Kugisaki cuts her off and counterattacks. Then Mai reveals herself

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 18
programme.desc: Battles are starting to be decided in different locations on the first day of the Exchange Event. Fushiguro faces off against Kamo, the heir to one of the three major clans. Kamo uses Blood Manipulation, a technique that controls his own blood, while Fushiguro fights him with shikigami and martial arts

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 19
programme.desc: The special grade cursed spirit, Hanami, suddenly intrudes on the Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Inumaki, and Kamo face off against Hanami, defending themselves as they race to cross the veil. The three are driven into a corner when Maki joins the fight and strings together a chain of attacks in combination with Fushiguro. However, even with that, they're still forced into dire straits by Hanami's overwhelming prowess.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 20
programme.desc: Itadori and Todo join the battle against Hanami. Itadori lands his Black Flash, and his Todo unleashes his cursed technique as they keep up their combo attack. Alongside his "brother", Itadori, Todo overwhelms Hanami with his tricky cursed technique and his clever, (self-proclaimed) 530,000 IQ mental CPU,

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 21
programme.desc: Gojo has driven Hanami away with his overwhelming strength. Mahito reunites with Hanami, who's on the verge of death, after stealing Sukuna's fingers and the Special Grade Cursed Object, Death Painting Wombs 1 through 3. They're steadily making progress with their preparations to seal Gojo Satoru on October 31st. Meanwhile, those with Jujutsu High are unable to discern the cursed spirits' objective.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 22
programme.desc: Three men have died under similar circumstances from a cursed spirit. Investigators discover the victims all attended the same middle school, so Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to investigate. Once they arrive, they learn it was Fushiguro's old middle school. There they learn that the victims were all found unconscious beneath Yasohachi Bridge, a local haunted location. They also learn that Fushiguro's older sister, Tsumiki, is caught up in this incident as well

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 23
programme.desc: In addition to the curse of Yasohachi Bridge, Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki face off against Kechizu, one of the special grade cursed objects: Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings. The three start fighting within the barrier of Yasohachi Bridge's curse, but something suddenly seizes Kugisaki's arm and drags her outside the barrier. Itadori and Kechizu chase after her, leaving the barrier. Left behind, Fushiguro quickly takes of the Yasohachi Bridge curse--until he witnesses a shocking sight.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Over a decade ago, a pathway called a "gate" appeared, which connected this world to another dimension. People called those who fought against the monsters on the other side of the gate "hunters."

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Jinwoo and the others are exploring a low-ranked dungeon, and they step into a temple dungeon they've never seen before. What awaits them inside are three rules, along with a monster that sends them into despair beyond fear.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Jinwoo remained alone in the temple dungeon to save what's left of his party.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: Jinwoo enters an instance dungeon from the entrance of a subway and levels up as he defeats monsters.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: Hwang Dongsuk’s party is short on their member quota to raid a C-rank dungeon. Jinwoo, along with another member, Yoo Jinho, join them in bolstering their numbers and the party makes easy work of the monsters and proceeds on.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: It seemed like the raid of the C-rank dungeon was going well.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While clearing the C-rank dungeon, Jinwoo annihilates every member of Hwang Dongsuk's party, who had tried to kill him for personal gains.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: Jinwoo has been looking for the item displayed in the window, the Elixir of Life, for his sick mother. But the quest to obtain this item is too difficult for Jinwoo that it would be nearly suicidal to attempt.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: At B20:C20r's Association, Jinwoo is reunited with Song Chiyul, Lee Joohee, Kim Sangshik, and Kang Jeongho, who have survived the Cartenon Temple. And he goes to explore the D-rank dungeon with Kang Taeshik and the others from the Surveillance Team.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: After the battle with Kang Taeshik, Jinwoo survives the tragedy once again. However, Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-rank hunter, may be after Jinwoo's life.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Out of the blue, a "job-change quest" pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, Jinwoo sets foot into a gate.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite being cornered, Jinwoo manages to defeat the Crimson Knight, Igris. Without a moment of respite, another window pops up to announce a new quest.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might…

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 15
programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 16
programme.desc: Todo points out that Itadori's Divergent Fist is a technique that won't work against special grades. When Itadori genuinely accepts his advice, Todo decides to face him and guide him with his full might. Meanwhile, Kugisaki picks a fight with Kyoto's Nishimiya. From the sidelines Mechamaru fires an attack at Panda, sparking the start of their battles with Kugisaki against Nishimiya and Panda against Mechamaru.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 17
programme.desc: The Exchange Event's Group Battle continues! Maki and Miwa face off, but Miwa can't hide her surprise at the overwhelming strength Maki displays despite her grade ranking. At the same time, Kugisaki pursues Nishimiya as she flies around on her broom. Nishimiya talks about Mai's hardships and what it's like to live as a female jujutsu sorcerer, but Kugisaki cuts her off and counterattacks. Then Mai reveals herself

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 18
programme.desc: Battles are starting to be decided in different locations on the first day of the Exchange Event. Fushiguro faces off against Kamo, the heir to one of the three major clans. Kamo uses Blood Manipulation, a technique that controls his own blood, while Fushiguro fights him with shikigami and martial arts

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 19
programme.desc: The special grade cursed spirit, Hanami, suddenly intrudes on the Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Inumaki, and Kamo face off against Hanami, defending themselves as they race to cross the veil. The three are driven into a corner when Maki joins the fight and strings together a chain of attacks in combination with Fushiguro. However, even with that, they're still forced into dire straits by Hanami's overwhelming prowess.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 20
programme.desc: Itadori and Todo join the battle against Hanami. Itadori lands his Black Flash, and his Todo unleashes his cursed technique as they keep up their combo attack. Alongside his "brother", Itadori, Todo overwhelms Hanami with his tricky cursed technique and his clever, (self-proclaimed) 530,000 IQ mental CPU,

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 21
programme.desc: Gojo has driven Hanami away with his overwhelming strength. Mahito reunites with Hanami, who's on the verge of death, after stealing Sukuna's fingers and the Special Grade Cursed Object, Death Painting Wombs 1 through 3. They're steadily making progress with their preparations to seal Gojo Satoru on October 31st. Meanwhile, those with Jujutsu High are unable to discern the cursed spirits' objective.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 22
programme.desc: Three men have died under similar circumstances from a cursed spirit. Investigators discover the victims all attended the same middle school, so Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to investigate. Once they arrive, they learn it was Fushiguro's old middle school. There they learn that the victims were all found unconscious beneath Yasohachi Bridge, a local haunted location. They also learn that Fushiguro's older sister, Tsumiki, is caught up in this incident as well

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 23
programme.desc: In addition to the curse of Yasohachi Bridge, Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki face off against Kechizu, one of the special grade cursed objects: Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings. The three start fighting within the barrier of Yasohachi Bridge's curse, but something suddenly seizes Kugisaki's arm and drags her outside the barrier. Itadori and Kechizu chase after her, leaving the barrier. Left behind, Fushiguro quickly takes of the Yasohachi Bridge curse--until he witnesses a shocking sight.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Over a decade ago, a pathway called a "gate" appeared, which connected this world to another dimension. People called those who fought against the monsters on the other side of the gate "hunters."

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Jinwoo and the others are exploring a low-ranked dungeon, and they step into a temple dungeon they've never seen before. What awaits them inside are three rules, along with a monster that sends them into despair beyond fear.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Jinwoo remained alone in the temple dungeon to save what's left of his party.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: Jinwoo enters an instance dungeon from the entrance of a subway and levels up as he defeats monsters.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: Hwang Dongsuk’s party is short on their member quota to raid a C-rank dungeon. Jinwoo, along with another member, Yoo Jinho, join them in bolstering their numbers and the party makes easy work of the monsters and proceeds on.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: It seemed like the raid of the C-rank dungeon was going well.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While clearing the C-rank dungeon, Jinwoo annihilates every member of Hwang Dongsuk's party, who had tried to kill him for personal gains.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: Jinwoo has been looking for the item displayed in the window, the Elixir of Life, for his sick mother. But the quest to obtain this item is too difficult for Jinwoo that it would be nearly suicidal to attempt.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: At B20:C20r's Association, Jinwoo is reunited with Song Chiyul, Lee Joohee, Kim Sangshik, and Kang Jeongho, who have survived the Cartenon Temple. And he goes to explore the D-rank dungeon with Kang Taeshik and the others from the Surveillance Team.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: After the battle with Kang Taeshik, Jinwoo survives the tragedy once again. However, Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-rank hunter, may be after Jinwoo's life.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Out of the blue, a "job-change quest" pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, Jinwoo sets foot into a gate.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite being cornered, Jinwoo manages to defeat the Crimson Knight, Igris. Without a moment of respite, another window pops up to announce a new quest.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: The Philly Kid
programme.desc: A former NCAA champion wrestler, paroled after ten years in prison, agrees to a series of cage fights to save a friend's life and is asked to do the impossible - lose.

programme.title: 1275 Days
programme.desc: 15-year-old Blake faces life in prison for felony murder after a botched home invasion. His single mom and girlfriend support his David vs. Goliath legal battle in Elkhart, Indiana, seeking a second chance.

programme.title: Kill Craft
programme.desc: Marina lives with her disabled mother and her hit man father. When he dies at work, she must take charge of the family business and take care of her mother. Marked to die, Marina must navigate the world of assassins to survive.

programme.title: The Last Champion
programme.desc: When his mother dies, scandal-ridden ex-Olympian John Wright returns to a hometown that has not forgiven him.

programme.title: Notorious Nick
programme.desc: Nick Newell, a one-armed MMA fighter, gets a rare chance to fight for the lightweight championship. He strives to win for himself and all the other people in the world with physical challenges.

programme.title: Crank: High Voltage
programme.desc: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

programme.title: Men of War
programme.desc: A former Special Ops soldier leads a group of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea: their mission is obtain the rights to the unusual treasure that the island beholds.

programme.title: Mercenary for Justice
programme.desc: A mercenary gets involved in a mission that threatens the lives of his kin. In order to succeed, he must break into one of the most well guarded prisons in Eastern Europe and free the son of the most notorious drug lord in the world today.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.

programme.title: Replicant
programme.desc: Scientists create a genetic clone of a serial killer in order to help catch the killer, teaming up with two cops.

programme.title: The Legend Of Hercules
programme.desc: The origin story of the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

programme.title: Fast Charlie
programme.desc: For twenty years, Charlie Swift has been a fixer and hitman for a mob boss named Stan. After a rival boss puts a hit on Stan and his crew, Charlie is the sole survivor and decides to avenge his friend.

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution
programme.desc: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: A girl falls for the "perfect" guy, who happens to have a very fatal flaw: he's a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.

programme.title: The Secret Scripture
programme.desc: A woman keeps a diary of her extended stay at a mental hospital.

programme.title: Hirokin
programme.desc: Hirokin, a reluctant hero marked by a dark past, must fulfill his destiny when forced to choose between avenging the murder of his family or fighting for the freedom of a people long abused.

programme.title: The Zero Theorem
programme.desc: A hugely talented but socially isolated computer operator is tasked by Management to prove the Zero Theorem: that the universe ends as nothing, rendering life meaningless. But meaning is what he already craves.

programme.title: Out for A Kill
programme.desc: An unsuspecting university professor is an unwitting accomplice in a foiled Chinese cocaine deal. Wrongly imprisoned, he escapes to take his revenge and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Cat.8: Night 1
programme.desc: An untested global defence system triggers a swarm of devastating solar flares, resulting in catastrophic earthquakes and ferocious magnetic storms; an unprecedented CAT. 8 Armageddon. Can we stop the annihilation of the human race?

programme.title: Cat.8: Night 2
programme.desc: Much to the world's surprise, the sun releases a gigantic coronal mass ejection, as the elite task force of the dangerous secretary of defence is hot on Ranger and Whitlow's trail. They are mankind's last hope. Can they save us once more?

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

programme.title: Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: While travelling abroad, a guy falls for a Romanian beauty whose unreachable heart has its origins in her violent, charismatic ex.

programme.title: Generation Um...
programme.desc: Three adults during a single day in New York City filled with sex, drugs, and indecision.
